title: Imac 27 card
message:
I want to buy card from ebay for this imac 27 [url]http://www.everymac.com/systems/apple/imac/specs/imac-core-2-duo-3.06-27-inch-aluminum-late-2009-specs.html[/url]

Which card are compatible? HD4670 and HD4850?
There are more part numbers?

title: Imac 27 card
message: You'll only find reflowed junk shit graphics cards for this mac.  Hopeless.....

title: Imac 27 card
message: Yes, I know that. Customers card is full damage and I want to buy a card and I can replace gpu later. Just nees to know which models I can look for.

title: Imac 27 card
message:
GPU Card late 2009 = 661-5315

Good luck finding good chips.Please let me know if you do.

title: Imac 27 card
message: Ebay seller doesnot use numbers like 661-5315. They use HD4670 and HD4850. I am just asking if there any more HD-XXXX card compatible with imac 27 2009.

title: Imac 27 card
message: All imac video cards from a 27" will work. Of course you are bound by the heat sink you have now or get a complete card. I have complete 4850 cards for sale if you are interested.
